name: Web Development
toLearn: You will build 16 web development projects for your portfolio, ready to apply for junior developer jobs.
You will master both front and back-end development, becoming a full-stack developer by the end of the course.
Build fully-fledged websites and web apps for your startup or business.
Master frontend development with React
Learn professional developer best practices.
You will learn the latest technologies, including Javascript, React, Node and even Web3 development.
After the course you will be able to build ANY website you want.
Work as a freelance web developer.
Master backend development with Node

name: Microsoft Office
toLearn: Learn the essential and advanced Microsoft Office Skills in Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Outlook, Teams and Access
Learn practical methods to backup and recover your Excel spreadsheets and never lose data
Discover the essentials of using formulas and functions in Excel
Learn practical methods to sort and filter your data in Excel
Learn how to insert shapes, graphics and pictures to add some zing to your PowerPoint
Wow your audience by adding animations, audio and video to PowerPoint
How to get set up in OutlookAll about sending and receiving emailsHow to customize your mailbox and view
How to organize and manage your mail including ignoring, flagging and conditional formatting

name: Graphics Designing
toLearn: You will have intermediate to expert level knowledge of graphic design theory that you will immediately be able to apply to your career, job, hobby, or company.
You will be given real-world, applicable projects that you can follow along with and practice.
You will learn color theory and how it applies to the world around us, from products and art to branding and advertising.
You will learn about logo design and branding, and the way that you or your company can use these ideas to get in the eyes of more people.
You will learn about the legal side of design and how you can take safe measures to make sure you are following the proper laws of copyright and trademarks.
NEW! Learn some 2021 design trends to look out for with three new student projects
Learn the Step-By-Step process to becoming a graphic designer

name: Digital Marketing
toLearn: How to generate more leads for your business online
Generate leads from your website
Create content that attracts high quality leads and sales
Use email to generate business leads
Implement everything you've learnt with a step-by-step workbook
Understand your sales funnel and how to fill it
Create and build landing pages
Learn the top commerce strategies, methods, tips & tricks to increase conversion and maximize sales.
Learn the bulletproof steps I use on each one of my product landing pages to psychologically convince my visitors to buy from me.

name: Motion Graphics
toLearn: You'll learn to take Excel spread sheets and animate this in After Effects.
You'll learn how to create percentage counters.
You'll learn how to create 'voice over' infographics.
You will have the finished files so you never fall behind.
You'll learn how to make animated pie charts, line charts & bar graphs.
You'll learn how to animate icons making beautiful infographics.

name: App Development
toLearn: You can build any Android app you can think of. No matter if it is an idea that you or your friends have, or if it is a contract job that you need to develop.
You'll be able to work as an Android freelancer and work from anywere in the world.
You'll be able to develop cloud apps using Google Firebase
You will build Apps for your portfolio to apply for jr. Android developer Jobs.
Publish your apps on Google Play and generate revenue with Google Pay and Google Ads
You will be very confident using Kotlin and programming in general
